original_text: The woman conceived and bore a son, and when she saw that he was a fine child, she hid him three months.
korean_text: 그 여자가 임신하여 아들을 낳으니 그가 잘 생긴 것을 보고 석 달 동안 그를 숨겼으나

sentences.original_text: The woman conceived and bore a son,
and when she saw that he was a fine child,

sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그를 석 달 동안 숨겼습니다.
